title.narrative: Peacebuilding through Education and Culture in Magdalena Medio- CAFOD Operational

description.narrative: CAFOD’s long standing partner, CPDMM the Programme for Development and Peace of the Magdalena Medio Region, with national coordination with CINEP, together with CAFOD will implement this project on peace education and culture in Colombia with a youth and gender focus. Working with 4956 young people and adults (with 52% women and 48% men) in 9 municipalities in the Madgalena Medio Region the project will contribute to an individual and collective peace building and reconciliation culture. It will strengthen the capacities of youth, civil society organizations (CSO), communities and local public institutions to promote peace education and culture, civic coexistence, social solidarity attuned to the environment. This will be achieved through (1) transforming knowledge, attitudes and behaviours of adolescents, young people, parents and teachers in 34 schools and promoting peace education and culture, reconciliation, conflict prevention, and peaceful coexistence in their relationships and with their environment, (2) working with civil society organizations and local communities in the Magdalena Medio region to implement pedagogical and cultural initiatives for the transformation of behaviours and to foster peace building and reconciliation, active citizenship and gender equality, as well as social solidarity attuned to the environment and (3) by promoting and disseminating experiences and methodologies of positive conflict transformation and the construction of a sustainable regional development through spaces of coexistence, dialogue and inter-sectorial negotiation, with citizen participation.
